forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
This morning in Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a gentle promise of warmth as the morning light spills across the skyline. Though a slight drizzle embraced the city earlier, it has given way to a sunny disposition, eager to elevate temperatures, which will ideally peak near 64 degrees. A West-Southwest breeze whispers cool affection, lightly kissing the skin without overwhelming it. As the day unfolds, clouds scatter, allowing glimpses of the city’s charm to shine brighter, though the afternoon will see a delicate descent to around 62.

Tonight, the skies will remain mostly clear, ushering in a serene calm with temperatures retreating to about 51 degrees. As the winds continue at their soft pace, the evening invites you to step outside, perhaps for a languid stroll along the Embarcadero, where the still waters reflect the encroaching tranquility of dusk. Layering a light jacket over casual attire would be wise, embracing both comfort and style as the cool evening settles in. Whether sipping coffee at a cozy café or exploring the city's hidden corners, today beckons you to enjoy its understated beauty, offering a gentle respite from the frenetic pace of life.
